attributes.action: Change Parliamentary rules to make the punishment for lying more severe.
attributes.additional_details: Change Parliamentary rules so that lying to the Commons is a legally punishable offence, like Perjury, and make it acceptable for an MP to be able to call out the lies.
attributes.background: At the moment it seems acceptable to lie to the Commons and wrong to call out the lies. This cannot be right.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Make lying in the House of Commons a criminal offence: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/576886

Create new body to oversee and sanction MPs for dishonesty: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/575036
